0.text: Innate - Awakened Spirit: Udyr has no ultimate ability and instead has 4 basic abilities that each incur a  1.5-second global cooldown when cast. Each ability grants a Stance that empowers his next two basic attacks, and switching Stances will replace the empowered attacks from the previous Stance.
0.html: Innate - Awakened Spirit: Udyr has no ultimate ability and instead has 4 basic abilities that each incur a  1.5-second global cooldown when cast. Each ability grants a Stance that empowers his next two basic attacks, and switching Stances will replace the empowered attacks from the previous Stance.
markedPassages: 1.5-second global cooldown

1.text: Periodically, after Udyr enters a Stance, he can cast it again at no cost after 0.25 seconds to Awaken it, refreshing the cooldown and empowering the Stance with an additional effect.This effect is placed on cooldown at the start of the game.
1.html:
Periodically, after Udyr enters a Stance, he can cast it again at no cost after 0.25 seconds to Awaken it, refreshing the cooldown and empowering the Stance with an additional effect.
This effect is placed on cooldown at the start of the game.

2.text: Innate - Monk Training: After casting an ability, Udyr empowers his next two basic attacks within 4 seconds to gain  30% bonus attack speed and refund 5% of Awakened Spirit's total cooldown, though not if the remaining cooldown is less than 1 second.
2.html: Innate - Monk Training: After casting an ability, Udyr empowers his next two basic attacks within 4 seconds to gain  30% bonus attack speed and refund 5% of Awakened Spirit's total cooldown, though not if the remaining cooldown is less than 1 second.
markedPassages: 30% bonus attack speed

0.text: Active - Stance: Udyr enters Claw Stance, empowering his next two basic attacks to gain  50 bonus range and deal bonus physical damage.
0.html: Active - Stance: Udyr enters Claw Stance, empowering his next two basic attacks to gain  50 bonus range and deal bonus physical damage.

0.content: 3 / 4 / 5 / 6 / 7 / 8% (+ 4% per 100 bonus AD) of target's maximum health

1.content: 6 / 8 / 10 / 12 / 14 / 16% (+ 8% per 100 bonus AD) of target's maximum health

markedPassages: 50
3 / 4 / 5 / 6 / 7 / 8% (+ 4% per 100 bonus AD) of target's maximum health

6 / 8 / 10 / 12 / 14 / 16% (+ 8% per 100 bonus AD) of target's maximum health

1.text: Additionally, Udyr gains bonus attack speed and deals bonus physical damage  on-hit for 4 seconds.
1.html: Additionally, Udyr gains bonus attack speed and deals bonus physical damage on-hit for 4 seconds.
markedPassages: on-hit

2.text: Recast - Awaken: Udyr gains an additional 20% − 70% (based on level) bonus attack speed. The empowered attacks deal an additional 2% − 4% (based on level) (+ 2% per 100 bonus AD) of target's maximum health  bonus physical damage. Udyr's next two basic attacks in any Stance are empowered to strike with lightning 6 times, dealing  bonus magic damage equal to 1.5% − 3% (based on level) (+ 0.8% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health per hit, chaining to up to 3 nearby  visible enemies and being able to hit the same target multiple times. This deals a minumum of 40 − 160 (based on level) against  minions and is capped at 20 (+ 100% bonus AD) (+ 50% AP) against  monsters.
2.html: Recast - Awaken: Udyr gains an additional 20% − 70% (based on level) bonus attack speed. The empowered attacks deal an additional 2% − 4% (based on level) (+ 2% per 100 bonus AD) of target's maximum health bonus physical damage. Udyr's next two basic attacks in any Stance are empowered to strike with lightning 6 times, dealing bonus magic damage equal to 1.5% − 3% (based on level) (+ 0.8% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health per hit, chaining to up to 3 nearby visible enemies and being able to hit the same target multiple times. This deals a minumum of 40 − 160 (based on level) against minions and is capped at 20 (+ 100% bonus AD) (+ 50% AP) against monsters.
markedPassages: 20% − 70% (based on level) bonus attack speed
2% − 4% (based on level) (+ 2% per 100 bonus AD) of target's maximum health

minions

0.text: Active - Stance: Udyr enters Mantle Stance, empowering his next two basic attacks to gain  life steal and  heal him for 1.2% of his maximum health (+ 8% AP) on-hit.
0.html: Active - Stance: Udyr enters Mantle Stance, empowering his next two basic attacks to gain  life steal and heal him for 1.2% of his maximum health (+ 8% AP) on-hit.
markedPassages: life steal
heal

1.text: Additionally, Udyr grants himself a  shield for 4 seconds.
1.html: Additionally, Udyr grants himself a shield for 4 seconds.
markedPassages: shield

2.text: Recast - Awaken: Udyr increases the  shield's strength, stacking with the remaining shield from the first cast, and  heals every 0.25 seconds over the next 4 seconds, as well as causes the empowered attacks to instead gain doubled  life steal and  heal him for 2.4% of his maximum health (+ 16% AP) on-hit.
2.html: Recast - Awaken: Udyr increases the shield's strength, stacking with the remaining shield from the first cast, and heals every 0.25 seconds over the next 4 seconds, as well as causes the empowered attacks to instead gain doubled  life steal and heal him for 2.4% of his maximum health (+ 16% AP) on-hit.
markedPassages: shield's
heals
life steal
heal

3.text: Healing on-hit is reduced to 60% against  minions.
3.html: Healing on-hit is reduced to 60% against minions.
markedPassages: minions

0.text: Active - Stance: Udyr enters Stampede Stance, empowering his basic attacks to have an  uncancellable windup and  pounce on the target to  stun them for 0.75 seconds. This cannot affect the same target more than once every few seconds.
0.html: Active - Stance: Udyr enters Stampede Stance, empowering his basic attacks to have an uncancellable windup and pounce on the target to stun them for 0.75 seconds. This cannot affect the same target more than once every few seconds.
markedPassages: uncancellable windup
pounce on the target
pounce
stun

1.text: Additionally, Udyr becomes  ghosted and gains  bonus movement speed for 4 seconds, which decays to 30% effectiveness over 1.5 seconds.
1.html: Additionally, Udyr becomes ghosted and gains  bonus movement speed for 4 seconds, which decays to 30% effectiveness over 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: ghosted
bonus movement speed

2.text: Recast - Awaken: Udyr gains  75 bonus attack range and an additional 30% − 40% (based on level) bonus movement speed. He also gains  immunity to crowd control for 1.5 seconds.
2.html: Recast - Awaken: Udyr gains  75 bonus attack range and an additional 30% − 40% (based on level) bonus movement speed. He also gains immunity to crowd control for 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: 75
30% − 40% (based on level) bonus movement speed
immunity to crowd control

0.text: Active - Stance: Udyr enters Storm Stance, empowering his next two basic attacks to deal 10 − 30 (based on level) (+ 30% AP) magic damage to nearby enemies.
0.html: Active - Stance: Udyr enters Storm Stance, empowering his next two basic attacks to deal 10 − 30 (based on level) (+ 30% AP) magic damage to nearby enemies.
markedPassages: 10 − 30 (based on level)

1.text: Additionally, Udyr summons a blizzard around himself for 4 seconds that deals magic damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies and  slows them.  Minions take 50 / 60 / 70 / 80% (based on level) damage.
1.html: Additionally, Udyr summons a blizzard around himself for 4 seconds that deals magic damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies and slows them. Minions take 50 / 60 / 70 / 80% (based on level) damage.
markedPassages: slows
Minions

2.text: Recast - Awaken: Udyr ends the blizzard if it is active and unleashes a glacial storm for 4 seconds that is able to move on its own, as well as causes the empowered attacks to instead deal their damage to enemies within that storm. The storm follows the closest nearby  visible target and applies the same effects but deals  bonus magic damage equal to「 1% − 2% (based on level) (+ 0.4375% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health per tick, capped at 10 − 50 (based on level) 」「 8% − 16% (based on level) (+ 3.5% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health over the duration, capped at 80 − 400 (based on level) 」against  monsters, and  slows by an additional 10%.
2.html: Recast - Awaken: Udyr ends the blizzard if it is active and unleashes a glacial storm for 4 seconds that is able to move on its own, as well as causes the empowered attacks to instead deal their damage to enemies within that storm. 3.text: The unleashed storm grants  sight of its surroundings and prioritizes following the last enemy Udyr has attacked while he is nearby, then enemy  champions, then non-champions, then Udyr.

abilities.concerningText: Active - Stance: Udyr enters Claw Stance, empowering his next two basic attacks to gain  50 bonus range and deal bonus physical damage.
Active - Stance: Udyr enters Claw Stance, empowering his next two basic attacks to gain  50 bonus range and deal bonus physical damage.
Additionally, Udyr gains bonus attack speed and deals bonus physical damage  on-hit for 4 seconds.

Active - Stance: Udyr enters Mantle Stance, empowering his next two basic attacks to gain  life steal and  heal him for 1.2% of his maximum health (+ 8% AP) on-hit.
Additionally, Udyr grants himself a  shield for 4 seconds.

Recast - Awaken: Udyr increases the  shield's strength, stacking with the remaining shield from the first cast, and  heals every 0.25 seconds over the next 4 seconds, as well as causes the empowered attacks to instead gain doubled  life steal and  heal him for 2.4% of his maximum health (+ 16% AP) on-hit.

Additionally, Udyr gains bonus attack speed and deals bonus physical damage  on-hit for 4 seconds.

textContent.text: Recast - Awaken: Udyr gains an additional 20% − 70% (based on level) bonus attack speed. The empowered attacks deal an additional 2% − 4% (based on level) (+ 2% per 100 bonus AD) of target's maximum health  bonus physical damage. Udyr's next two basic attacks in any Stance are empowered to strike with lightning 6 times, dealing  bonus magic damage equal to 1.5% − 3% (based on level) (+ 0.8% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health per hit, chaining to up to 3 nearby  visible enemies and being able to hit the same target multiple times. This deals a minumum of 40 − 160 (based on level) against  minions and is capped at 20 (+ 100% bonus AD) (+ 50% AP) against  monsters.
textContent.html: Recast - Awaken: Udyr gains an additional 20% − 70% (based on level) bonus attack speed. The empowered attacks deal an additional 2% − 4% (based on level) (+ 2% per 100 bonus AD) of target's maximum health bonus physical damage. Udyr's next two basic attacks in any Stance are empowered to strike with lightning 6 times, dealing bonus magic damage equal to 1.5% − 3% (based on level) (+ 0.8% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health per hit, chaining to up to 3 nearby visible enemies and being able to hit the same target multiple times. This deals a minumum of 40 − 160 (based on level) against minions and is capped at 20 (+ 100% bonus AD) (+ 50% AP) against monsters.
markedPassages: 2% − 4% (based on level) (+ 2% per 100 bonus AD) of target's maximum health

textContent.text: Active - Stance: Udyr enters Mantle Stance, empowering his next two basic attacks to gain  life steal and  heal him for 1.2% of his maximum health (+ 8% AP) on-hit.
textContent.html: Active - Stance: Udyr enters Mantle Stance, empowering his next two basic attacks to gain  life steal and heal him for 1.2% of his maximum health (+ 8% AP) on-hit.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active - Stance: Udyr enters Mantle Stance, empowering his next two basic attacks to gain  life steal and  heal him for 1.2% of his maximum health (+ 8% AP) on-hit.

textContent.text: Additionally, Udyr grants himself a  shield for 4 seconds.
textContent.html: Additionally, Udyr grants himself a shield for 4 seconds.

skillTabs.concerningText: Additionally, Udyr grants himself a  shield for 4 seconds.

textContent.text: Recast - Awaken: Udyr increases the  shield's strength, stacking with the remaining shield from the first cast, and  heals every 0.25 seconds over the next 4 seconds, as well as causes the empowered attacks to instead gain doubled  life steal and  heal him for 2.4% of his maximum health (+ 16% AP) on-hit.
textContent.html: Recast - Awaken: Udyr increases the shield's strength, stacking with the remaining shield from the first cast, and heals every 0.25 seconds over the next 4 seconds, as well as causes the empowered attacks to instead gain doubled  life steal and heal him for 2.4% of his maximum health (+ 16% AP) on-hit.

skillTabs.concerningText: Recast - Awaken: Udyr increases the  shield's strength, stacking with the remaining shield from the first cast, and  heals every 0.25 seconds over the next 4 seconds, as well as causes the empowered attacks to instead gain doubled  life steal and  heal him for 2.4% of his maximum health (+ 16% AP) on-hit.

Recast - Awaken: Udyr increases the  shield's strength, stacking with the remaining shield from the first cast, and  heals every 0.25 seconds over the next 4 seconds, as well as causes the empowered attacks to instead gain doubled  life steal and  heal him for 2.4% of his maximum health (+ 16% AP) on-hit.

Recast - Awaken: Udyr increases the  shield's strength, stacking with the remaining shield from the first cast, and  heals every 0.25 seconds over the next 4 seconds, as well as causes the empowered attacks to instead gain doubled  life steal and  heal him for 2.4% of his maximum health (+ 16% AP) on-hit.

Recast - Awaken: Udyr increases the  shield's strength, stacking with the remaining shield from the first cast, and  heals every 0.25 seconds over the next 4 seconds, as well as causes the empowered attacks to instead gain doubled  life steal and  heal him for 2.4% of his maximum health (+ 16% AP) on-hit.

textContent.text: Healing on-hit is reduced to 60% against  minions.
textContent.html: Healing on-hit is reduced to 60% against minions.

textContent.text: Active - Stance: Udyr enters Stampede Stance, empowering his basic attacks to have an  uncancellable windup and  pounce on the target to  stun them for 0.75 seconds. This cannot affect the same target more than once every few seconds.
textContent.html: Active - Stance: Udyr enters Stampede Stance, empowering his basic attacks to have an uncancellable windup and pounce on the target to stun them for 0.75 seconds. This cannot affect the same target more than once every few seconds.

textContent.text: Additionally, Udyr becomes  ghosted and gains  bonus movement speed for 4 seconds, which decays to 30% effectiveness over 1.5 seconds.
textContent.html: Additionally, Udyr becomes ghosted and gains  bonus movement speed for 4 seconds, which decays to 30% effectiveness over 1.5 seconds.

skillTabs.concerningText: Additionally, Udyr becomes  ghosted and gains  bonus movement speed for 4 seconds, which decays to 30% effectiveness over 1.5 seconds.
Additionally, Udyr becomes  ghosted and gains  bonus movement speed for 4 seconds, which decays to 30% effectiveness over 1.5 seconds.

textContent.text: Recast - Awaken: Udyr gains  75 bonus attack range and an additional 30% − 40% (based on level) bonus movement speed. He also gains  immunity to crowd control for 1.5 seconds.
textContent.html: Recast - Awaken: Udyr gains  75 bonus attack range and an additional 30% − 40% (based on level) bonus movement speed. He also gains immunity to crowd control for 1.5 seconds.

textContent.text: Active - Stance: Udyr enters Storm Stance, empowering his next two basic attacks to deal 10 − 30 (based on level) (+ 30% AP) magic damage to nearby enemies.
textContent.html: Active - Stance: Udyr enters Storm Stance, empowering his next two basic attacks to deal 10 − 30 (based on level) (+ 30% AP) magic damage to nearby enemies.

textContent.text: Additionally, Udyr summons a blizzard around himself for 4 seconds that deals magic damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies and  slows them.  Minions take 50 / 60 / 70 / 80% (based on level) damage.
textContent.html: Additionally, Udyr summons a blizzard around himself for 4 seconds that deals magic damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies and slows them. Minions take 50 / 60 / 70 / 80% (based on level) damage.

skillTabs.concerningText: Additionally, Udyr summons a blizzard around himself for 4 seconds that deals magic damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies and  slows them.  Minions take 50 / 60 / 70 / 80% (based on level) damage.

Additionally, Udyr summons a blizzard around himself for 4 seconds that deals magic damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies and  slows them.  Minions take 50 / 60 / 70 / 80% (based on level) damage.

Additionally, Udyr summons a blizzard around himself for 4 seconds that deals magic damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies and  slows them.  Minions take 50 / 60 / 70 / 80% (based on level) damage.

textContent.text: Recast - Awaken: Udyr ends the blizzard if it is active and unleashes a glacial storm for 4 seconds that is able to move on its own, as well as causes the empowered attacks to instead deal their damage to enemies within that storm. The storm follows the closest nearby  visible target and applies the same effects but deals  bonus magic damage equal to「 1% − 2% (based on level) (+ 0.4375% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health per tick, capped at 10 − 50 (based on level) 」「 8% − 16% (based on level) (+ 3.5% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health over the duration, capped at 80 − 400 (based on level) 」against  monsters, and  slows by an additional 10%.
textContent.html: Recast - Awaken: Udyr ends the blizzard if it is active and unleashes a glacial storm for 4 seconds that is able to move on its own, as well as causes the empowered attacks to instead deal their damage to enemies within that storm. The storm follows the closest nearby visible target and applies the same effects but deals bonus magic damage equal to「 1% − 2% (based on level) (+ 0.4375% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health per tick, capped at 10 − 50 (based on level) 」「 8% − 16% (based on level) (+ 3.5% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health over the duration, capped at 80 − 400 (based on level) 」against monsters, and slows by an additional 10%.

skillTabs.concerningText: Recast - Awaken: Udyr ends the blizzard if it is active and unleashes a glacial storm for 4 seconds that is able to move on its own, as well as causes the empowered attacks to instead deal their damage to enemies within that storm. The storm follows the closest nearby  visible target and applies the same effects but deals  bonus magic damage equal to「 1% − 2% (based on level) (+ 0.4375% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health per tick, capped at 10 − 50 (based on level) 」「 8% − 16% (based on level) (+ 3.5% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health over the duration, capped at 80 − 400 (based on level) 」against  monsters, and  slows by an additional 10%.

markedPassages: 「 1% − 2% (based on level) (+ 0.4375% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health per tick, capped at 10 − 50 (based on level) 」
「 8% − 16% (based on level) (+ 3.5% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health over the duration, capped at 80 − 400 (based on level) 」

textContent.text: The unleashed storm grants  sight of its surroundings and prioritizes following the last enemy Udyr has attacked while he is nearby, then enemy  champions, then non-champions, then Udyr.
textContent.html: The unleashed storm grants sight of its surroundings and prioritizes following the last enemy Udyr has attacked while he is nearby, then enemy champions, then non-champions, then Udyr.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+400 health
+30 armor
+30 magic resistance

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Voidborn Resilience: For each second in combat with champions, gain 2 bonus armor and bonus magic resistance for 6 seconds, stacking up to 8 times for a maximum of 16 bonus resistances. At maximum stacks, instantly deal 80 (+ 7% bonus health) magic damage to enemy champions within 700 units, heal for the same amount for each target damaged, and increase your bonus resistances by 20% until the end of combat.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 armor and 5 magic resistance.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – VOIDBORN RESILIENCE: For each second in combat with champions, gain 2 bonus armor and bonus magic resistance for 6 seconds, stacking up to 8 times for a maximum of 16 bonus resistances. At maximum stacks, instantly deal 80 (+ 7% bonus health) magic damage to enemy champions within 700 units,  heal for the same amount for each target damaged, and increase your bonus resistances by 20% until the end of combat.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  800

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+500 health
+50 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Immolate: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 15 (+ 1.75% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within 325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, with the damage being increased by 25% against minions. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage. Damaging enemy champions or epic monsters with this effect grants a stack for 5 seconds that increases subsequent Immolate damage by 10%, stacking up to 6 times for a 60% increase.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IMMOLATE: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 15 (+ 1.75% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within  325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, with the damage being increased by 25% against minions. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage. Damaging enemy champions or epic monsters with this effect grants a stack for 5 seconds that increases subsequent Immolate damage by 10%, stacking up to 6 times for a 60% increase.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+40 ability power

Stats

+350 health
+70 magic resistance
+5% movement speed

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Absorb: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 6 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.
Unique – Dissipate: While at 6 stacks of Steadfast, gain 10% bonus movement speed and reduce all incoming magic damage by 25%.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ABSORB: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 6 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming  immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.
